Join the Community!

We provide a variety of ways to communicate with and learn from the Gluster community.

Twitter

Our Twitter feed is a great way to stay current with announcements and news. Follow us and keep in touch!

@glusterorg

IRC Chat

Directly chat with the core developers and other Gluster experts and users on the IRC channel. Since the chat happens in realtime, please be aware of timezones, as the community is pretty global.

#gluster channel on irc.gnu.org.

Mailing Lists

Gluster Users

General GlusterFS discussion by users and developers.

Gluster Devel

More in-depth Gluster development discussion, by core Gluster developers.

Developer Forge

GlusterForge

GlusterFS and related projects have their git repositories and other resources on Gluster Forge. Check out what's happening around GlusterFS!

Bugs

Gluster uses the Red Hat Bugzilla for development and bug tracking. Gluster can be found in the Community Projects section.

» Report a problem in Gluster

» Report a problem in Documentation

Gluster Meetups

Find other Gluster users and developers near you!

» Check for a local Gluster community!
